snippet.textDisplay: Loved the song. I would suggest that people do not take offence at some of the caustic comments made by some on the forum. There will always be a set of people who will criticize anything for the sake of criticism. Usually such people do not end up doing anything worthwhile themselves precisely because they are too wary of others of their own ilk. It does after all take a lot of effort to come up with something memorable, but does not take any effort at all to run something down
snippet.textOriginal: Loved the song. I would suggest that people do not take offence at some of the caustic comments made by some on the forum. snippet.textDisplay: What has a language being older than the other got to do with anything? Regarding me not liking tamil, its just a personal opinion man, learn to take it. Tamil doesnt sound good to me,  just because "it doesnt sound good!" All the crude and harsh sounds it incorporates, it lacks the finesse and delicacy needed to make it sound good to the ears, like french, persian, spanish, urdu, armenian  etc. Even though I dont understand them either, but its good to the ears, unlike tamil, or german lol
snippet.textOriginal: What has a language being older than the other got to do with anything? Regarding me not liking tamil, its just a personal opinion man, learn to take it. snippet.textDisplay:
Well, it might sound the same for a person that doesn't know persian. . Every language is unique and has its own beauty .. 

Moreover whatever they sing isn't pure tamil .. poetic tamil isn't in use anymore(when spoken/written ) .. every language goes through this phase .. Now especially due to different cultural influences .. 

What I'm trying to say is, let's not compare tamil with any other language.. 

Peace :)
snippet.textOriginal:
Well, it might sound the same for a person that doesn't know persian. . Every language is unique and has its own beauty .. 

Moreover whatever they sing isn't pure tamil .. poetic tamil isn't in use anymore(when spoken/written ) .. every language goes through this phase .. Now especially due to different cultural influences .. 

What I'm trying to say is, let's not compare tamil with any other language.. 

Peace :)

Yaaro yaar arivaaro?
Yenna solvaaro sol...

snippet.textDisplay: One of the best song I have heard in the recent past. Late Legendary Poet Vaali came up with touching lyrics even at his last days like the one he wrote for Maryan (Naetru Aval Irunthaal) Rahmans composition specially his voice goes straight in to the heart. String Orchestration is just awesome. We are proud of you Rahman sir.
